sentence.Network_en: This is a poetical picture of the landscape.
sentence.Network_cn: 这是一幅富有诗意的风景画.

sentence.Network_en: John is making a periphrastic study in a worn-out poetical fashion.
sentence.Network_cn: 约翰正在对陈腐的诗风做迂回冗长的研究。

sentence.Network_en: He was a man of strong, native, poetical feeling.
sentence.Network_cn: 他有一种强烈的, 自然的, 富有诗意的情操.

PerfectNetExp.abs: like TS Eliot's poetical cat , he said , Britain's prime minister has a knack of vanishing when there is " dirty work to be done " .他说，英国首相面对一堆“必须完成的脏活”时，就像美国诗人艾略特诗中的猫一样，有一种迅速消失的诀窍。
lyrical充满感情的，抒情的poetical诗意的，浪漫的ecstatic狂喜的，入迷的，心醉神迷的
poetical idea pink , then golden , then grey , then black .多么富于诗意的构思啊，粉色，然后是金色，接着是灰色，接着又是黑色。
poetica 诗学, poetical 虚设, poetica 诗艺

list.abs: Brandon Wong 黄炯耀 - xinmsn -... ... 我们等你 Don’t Stop Believin' 微笑正义 Poetic Justice 好运到 It’s A Wonderful Life.

...多文学兴趣中某一方面，而这一方面则与人们对“诗性”小说家（poetic novelist）所形成的传统见解大相径庭。

entry.def: Poetical means the same as poetic .

example.ex: ...a work of real merit and genuine poetical feeling.
